ModMetaData.name: Glitter Tech (No Surgery)
ModMetaData.author: Sam
ModMetaData.description: Version 1.45 - GlitterTech adds a ton of shiny new and futuristic items found on the richer developed Glitter worlds. But, this expensive and illegal tech attracts attention of Glitter world Commandos. This version has no advanced surgery for compatibility with other(better) mods.
